scripts.build: npm run pre-build && npm run build:normal && npm run build:min
scripts.build:normal: browserify index.js -o dist/dragon-drop.js --standalone DragonDrop -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.build:min: browserify -g uglifyify index.js -o dist/dragon-drop.min.js --standalone DragonDrop -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.dev: watchify index.js -o dist/dragon-drop.js --verbose --standalone DragonDrop -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
